snippet: Readers debate an Op-Ed writer’s assertion that the media should print offensive language when it’s essential to a news article.
lead_paragraph: Readers debate an Op-Ed writer’s assertion that the media should print offensive language when it’s essential to a news article.

headline.main: Delete the Expletives, or the Euphemisms?
headline.print_headline: Delete the Expletives, or the Euphemisms?
